source.name: MCQ Example Question
source.guidance: Brandon Eich created the JavaScript language in 10 days as an employee of Netscape Communications Corporation.

source.name: Fill in the Blank Example Question
source.text:
<<<False>>> JavaScript is a compiled language.
<<<True>>> You are no longer required to use a semi-colon at the end of a line.
source.guidance:
False, JavaScript is an interpreted language.
True, as of ES6 semi-colons are not mandatory at the end of a line of code.

text: You are no longer required to use a semi-colon at the end of a line.

source.name: Parson's Problem Example
source.instructions: Drag the code blocks below into the correct order. Do not use any extraneous code blocks in the final answer.
source.initial:
First correct code block
Second correct code block
Third correct code block
Incorrect code block #distractor
Incorrect code block #distractor
source.guidance:
The correct order is as follows:

```
First correct code block
Second correct code block
Third correct code block
```

The incorrect code blocks should be ignored.
